English: Choose the BIOS image to use. The official BIOS must be provided by the user. Using a non-official (or builtin) BIOS might result in incompatibility problems with some games. Best results are to be achieved with the official Nintendo BIOS.
Chinese: 选择要使用的BIOS映像。官方BIOS必须由用户提供。使用非官方(或内置)BIOS可能会导致某些游戏出现不兼容问题。最好的结果是通过官方的任天堂BIOS来实现。

English: Choose whether to boot the BIOS before the game or not. There's not much difference in either modes.
Chinese: 选择是否在游戏前启动BIOS。两种模式都没有太大区别。

English: Skip frames to avoid audio buffer under-run (crackling). Improves performance at the expense of visual smoothness. 'Auto' skips frames when advised by the frontend. 'Manual' utilises the 'Frameskip Threshold (%)' setting.
Chinese: 跳过帧以避免音频缓冲区不足(爆裂)。以牺牲视觉平滑度为代价提高性能。当前端建议时，‘自动’跳过帧。‘自动(阈值)’使用‘跳帧阈值(%)’设置。‘固定间隔’利用‘跳帧间隔’设置。

English: When 'Frameskip' is set to 'Manual', specifies the audio buffer occupancy threshold (percentage) below which frames will be skipped. Higher values reduce the risk of crackling by causing frames to be dropped more frequently.
Chinese: 当“帧跳过”设置为“手动”时，指定音频缓冲区占用阈值（百分比），低于该阈值将跳过帧。较高的值会导致框架更频繁地掉落，从而降低破裂的风险。

English: When 'Frameskip' is set to 'Fixed Interval', the value set here is the number of frames omitted after a frame is rendered - i.e. '0' = 60fps, '1' = 30fps, '2' = 15fps, etc.
Chinese: 当‘跳帧’设置为‘固定间隔’时，此处设置的值是渲染帧后忽略的帧数，即‘0’=60fps，‘1’=30fps，’2’=15fps等。

English: Adjusts output colors to match the display of real GBA hardware.
Chinese: 调整输出颜色以匹配实际GBA硬件的显示。

English: Simulates LCD ghosting effects by performing a 50:50 mix of the current and previous frames. Required for correct operation when playing games that exploit LCD ghosting for transparency effects (F-Zero, the Boktai series, etc.).
Chinese: 通过对当前帧和前一帧进行50:50的混合来模拟LCD重影效果。在玩利用LCD重影获得透明效果的游戏(F-Zero、Boktai系列等)时，需要正确操作。

English: Choose the data format used for cartridge save files. 'gpSP' can be used for compatibility with the stand-alone version of gpSP. 'libretro' provides better integration with the frontend.
Chinese: 选择用于盒式磁带保存文件的数据格式。‘gpSP’可用于与独立版本的gpSP兼容。‘libretro’提供了与前端的更好集成。

English: Dynamically recompile CPU instructions to native instructions. Greatly improves performance, but may reduce accuracy.
Chinese: 动态地将CPU指令重新编译为本机指令。极大地提高了性能，但可能会降低准确性。

English: Specify the repeat interval (in frames) when holding down the Turbo A/B buttons.
Chinese: 指定按下连发A/B按钮时的重复间隔(以帧为单位)。

English: Configure processor overclocking and emulation accuracy parameters affecting low-level performance and compatibility.
Chinese: 配置影响低级别性能和兼容性的处理器超频和仿真精度参数。

English: Specify which region the system is from. 'PAL' is 50hz, 'NTSC' is 60hz. Games will run faster or slower than normal if the incorrect region is selected.
Chinese: 指定系统来自哪个区域。'PAL制式为50赫兹，NTSC制式为60赫兹。如果选择了不正确的区域，游戏将比正常情况下运行得更快或更慢。

English: Enable a low pass audio filter to soften treble artifacts and mimic the 'bassy' sound of original SNES hardware.
Chinese: 启用低通音频滤波器以软化高音伪影，并模仿原始SNES硬件的“低音”声音。

English: Specify the cut-off frequency of the low pass audio filter. A higher value increases the perceived 'strength' of the filter, since a wider range of the high frequency spectrum is attenuated.
Chinese: 指定低通音频滤波器的截止频率。较高的值会增加滤波器的感知“强度”，因为高频频谱的较宽范围会衰减。

English: Many games for the SNES suffered from slowdown due to the weak main CPU. This option helps allievate that at the cost of possible bugs. COMPATIBLE: Reduce slowdown but keep as much game compatibility as much as possible. MAX: Reduce slowdown as much as possible but will break more games.
Chinese: SNES的许多游戏由于主CPU不足而速度减慢。这个选项有助于以可能的错误为代价来缓解这种情况。兼容：减少速度减慢，但尽可能保持游戏兼容性。极限：尽可能减少减速，但会破坏更多的游戏。

English: Increases number of sprites that can be drawn simultaneously on screen. Reduces flickering in games.
Chinese: 增加可以在屏幕上同时绘制的精灵数量。减少游戏中的闪烁。
更改网络游戏链接 (多人)

English: Selects palette used for colorizing Game Boy games when 'GB Colorization' is set to 'Internal', or when 'GB Colorization' is set to 'Auto' and game has no pre-defined SGB/GBC palette. 'GB' palettes mimic the display of original Game Boy hardware. 'GBC' palettes are identical to the built-in presets of the Game Boy Color. 'SGB' palettes are identical to the built-in presets of the Super Game Boy.
Chinese: 选择 'GB 色彩化' 时用于彩色游戏的调色板。'GB 色彩化' 设置为 '内部'， 或者当“GB 色彩化”设置为“自动”且游戏没有预定义的 SGB/GBC 调色板。 'GB'的调色板模拟GameBoy硬件的显示。'GBC' 色板与GameBoy颜色的内置预设相同。 'SGB'调色板与SuperGameBoy的内置预设相同。
使用官方引导程序（需重启生效）

English: Force core to use NTSC, PAL or Dendy region timings.
Chinese: 强制核心使用NTSC、PAL或Dendy区域的时序。
游戏精灵附加组件（需要重启）

English: Enable emulation of a Game Genie add-on cartridge, allowing cheat codes to be entered when launching games. The Game Genie ROM file 'gamegenie.nes' must be present in the frontend's system directory. Does not apply to FDS or arcade content.
Chinese: 启用游戏精灵附加卡带的模拟功能，允许在启动游戏时输入作弊码。游戏精灵ROM文件“gamegenie.nes”必须位于前端的系统目录中。不适用于FDS或街机内容。

English: Show advanced system options and tweaks.
Chinese: 显示高级系统选项和调整。

English: Show advanced sound options and tweaks.
Chinese: 显示高级音频选项和调整。

English: Removes 8 pixel overscan from all sides of the screen.
Chinese: 从屏幕的四边移除8像素的过扫描。

English: Removes pixels from left side of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: 从屏幕左侧移除像素，以模拟标准CRT电视上的过扫描效果。

English: Removes pixels from right side of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: 从屏幕右侧移除像素，以模拟标准CRT电视上的过扫描效果。

English: Removes pixels from the top of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: 移除屏幕顶部的像素，以模拟标准CRT电视的过扫描效果。

English: Removes pixels from the bottom of the screen to simulate overscan seen on standard CRT televisions.
Chinese: 移除屏幕底部的像素，以模拟标准CRT电视的过扫描效果。

English: Choose from pre-generated palettes, a custom 64x3 palette from file or raw format (needs to use a nes-decoder shader).
Chinese: 可选择预生成的调色板、自定义的64x3调色板文件或原始格式（需使用nes-decoder着色器）。

English: Blargg's NTSC filters are used to replicate RF, Composite, S-Video, and RGB cable signals.
Chinese: Blargg的NTSC滤镜用于模拟RF、AV端子、S端子和RGB信号。

English: Enable higher quality sound. Increases performance requirements.
Chinese: 启用更高质量的音频，会增加性能需求。

English: Apply a low pass audio filter to simulate the 'muted' sound of the NES when connected to a television via the RF modulator.
Chinese: 应用低通音频滤波器，模拟NES通过RF调制解调器连接电视时的“沉闷”音效。

English: Enable a fake stereo sound effect by delaying the right audio channel when upmixing the mono signal output from the NES.
Chinese: 在将NES输出的单声道信号进行上混音时，通过延迟右声道来实现假立体声效果。

English: Simulates the sound from famiclones that have the pulse wave channels duty cycle bits reversed.
Chinese: 模拟那些脉冲波通道占空比位被反转的仿制NES游戏机的声音。

English: Enables or disables pulse wave generator audio output 1.
Chinese: 启用或禁用脉冲波生成器音频通道 1。

English: Enables or disables pulse wave generator audio output 2.
Chinese: 启用或禁用脉冲波生成器音频通道 2。

English: Enables or disables triangle wave generator audio output.
Chinese: 启用或禁用三角波生成器音频输出。

English: Enables or disables noise generator audio output.
Chinese: 启用或禁用噪音发生器音频输出。

English: Enables or disables delta modulation channel audio output.
Chinese: 启用或禁用增量调制音频输出通道。

English: Repeat rate of turbo buttons in frames.
Chinese: 按钮的连发率（以帧为单位）。

English: Selects device to use for Zapper games.
Chinese: 选择用于光枪游戏的设备。
旋转屏幕 + 激活方向键
【GBL法米通限定机】网格线 + 色彩校正

English: The Mega Drive/Genesis main CPU (Motorola 68000) generates an Address Error exception (crash) when attempting to perform unaligned memory access. Enabling this will simulate this behavior. It should only be disabled when playing ROM hacks, since these are typically developed using less accurate emulators and may rely on invalid RAM access for correct operation.
Chinese: Mega Drive/Genesis主CPU（Motorola 68000）在尝试进行未对齐的内存访问时，会触发地址错误异常（导致崩溃）。启用此功能可以模拟这一行为。仅在运行ROM改版时才建议禁用此功能，因为此类改版通常基于精度较低的模拟器开发，可能依赖无效内存访问以确保正常运行。

English: Adjust the high range band of the internal audio equalizer.
Chinese: 调节内部音频均衡器的高频段。

English: Adjust the middle range band of the internal audio equalizer.
Chinese: 调节内部音频均衡器的中频段。

English: Adjust the low range band of the internal audio equalizer.
Chinese: 调节内部音频均衡器的低频段。

English: Enable a low pass audio filter to better simulate the characteristic sound of a Model 1 Mega Drive/Genesis.
Chinese: 启用低通音频滤波器，更准确地还原第一代Mega Drive/Genesis的经典音效。

English: Apply a video filter to mimic various NTSC TV signals.
Chinese: 启用视频滤镜，模拟不同类型的NTSC电视信号。

English: Choose the preferred content aspect ratio. This will only apply when RetroArch's aspect ratio is set to 'Core provided' in the Video settings.
Chinese: 选择显示比例。仅当RetroArch的视频设置中将比例选项设为“核心提供”时，此设置才会生效。

English: Use official BIOS/bootloader for emulated hardware, if present in RetroArch's system directory. Displays console-specific start-up sequence/animation, then runs loaded content.
Chinese: 如果RetroArch的系统目录中存在官方BIOS或引导程序，则使用它来模拟硬件。将显示主机特定的启动序列或动画，然后运行加载的内容。

English: When running Sega CD/Mega-CD content, specifies whether to share a single backup ram cart for all games (Per-Cart) or to create a separate backup ram cart for each game (Per-Game).
Chinese: 在运行Sega CD/Mega-CD内容时，选择是为所有游戏共享一个备份RAM卡（共享），还是为每个游戏创建一个独立的备份RAM卡（每个游戏独立）。

English: CD Backup Cart BRAM Size (Requires Restart)
Sets the backup ram cart size when running Sega CD/Mega-CD content. Useful when setting the backup ram cart to Per-Game to avoid multiple larger cart sizes.
Chinese: 设置运行Sega CD/Mega-CD内容时的备份RAM卡大小。此选项在将备份RAM卡设置为每个游戏独立时特别有用，可以避免生成多个较大的卡带。

English: Simulate original CD hardware latency when initiating a read or seeking to a specific location on loaded disc. This is required by a few CD games that crash if CD data is available too soon and also fixes CD audio desync issues in some games. Disabling this can be useful with MSU-MD games as it makes CD audio tracks loops more seamless.
Chinese: 在启动读取或跳转到加载光盘上特定位置时，模拟原始CD硬件的延迟。某些CD游戏需要此功能，因为如果CD数据提前加载，它们会崩溃，同时它还可以修复一些游戏中的CD音频不同步问题。禁用此功能对于MSU-MD游戏非常有用，因为它可以使CD音频轨道的循环更加顺畅。

English: Load CD image to memory on startup. CHD supported only. Restart Required.
Chinese: 在启动时将CD镜像加载到内存中，仅支持CHD格式。需要重启。

English: Show Advanced Audio Volume Settings (Reopen menu)
Chinese: 显示高级音频音量设置（重新打开菜单）

English: Enable configuration of low-level audio channel parameters. NOTE: Quick Menu must be toggled for this setting to take effect.
Chinese: 启用低级音频通道参数配置。注意：需要切换快速菜单才能使此设置生效。

English: Reduce the volume of the PSG Tone Channel 0.
Reduce the volume of the PSG Tone Channel 1.
Reduce the volume of the PSG Tone Channel 2.
Reduce the volume of the PSG Noise Channel 3.

Chinese: Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道0音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Mega Drive/Genesis FM Channel 0. Only works with MAME FM emulators.
Chinese: 调低Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道0的音量，仅适用于MAME FM模拟器。
Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道1音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Mega Drive/Genesis FM Channel 1. Only works with MAME FM emulators.
Chinese: 调低Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道1的音量，仅适用于MAME FM模拟器。
Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道2音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Mega Drive/Genesis FM Channel 2. Only works with MAME FM emulators.
Chinese: 调低Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道2的音量，仅适用于MAME FM模拟器。
Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道3音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Mega Drive/Genesis FM Channel 3. Only works with MAME FM emulators.
Chinese: 调低Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道3的音量，仅适用于MAME FM模拟器。
Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道4音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Mega Drive/Genesis FM Channel 4. Only works with MAME FM emulators.
Chinese: 调低Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道4的音量，仅适用于MAME FM模拟器。
Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道5音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Mega Drive/Genesis FM Channel 5. Only works with MAME FM emulators.
Chinese: 调低Mega Drive/Genesis FM通道5的音量，仅适用于MAME FM模拟器。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道0音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 0.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道0的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道1音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 1.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道1的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道2音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 2.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道2的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道3音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 3.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道3的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道4音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 4.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道4的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道5音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 5.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道5的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道6音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 6.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道6的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道7音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 7.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道7的音量。
Master System FM（YM2413）通道8音量百分比

English: Reduce the volume of the Master System FM Channel 8.
Chinese: 调低Master System FM通道8的音量。

English: Adjust the mixing volume of the emulated CD audio playback output.
Chinese: 调整模拟CD音频播放输出的混音音量。

English: Adjust the mixing volume of the emulated Sega CD/Mega-CD RF5C164 PCM sound generator output.
Chinese: 调整模拟Sega CD/Mega-CD RF5C164 PCM声音生成器的混音音量。
增强的逐单元垂直滚动功能

English: Allows each individual cell to be scrolled vertically, instead of 16px 2-cell, by averaging out with the vscroll value of the neighbouring cell. This hack only applies to few games that use 2-cell vertical scroll mode.
Chinese: 允许每个单元格独立垂直滚动，而非以16px为单位的2单元模式，通过与相邻单元格的vscroll值取平均实现。此修改仅适用于少数使用2单元垂直滚动模式的游戏
逐单元垂直滚动增强限制

English: Only when Enhanced per-tile vertical scroll is enabled. Adjusts the limit of the vertical scroll enhancement. When the vscroll difference between neighbouring tiles is bigger than this limit, the enhancement is disabled.
Chinese: 仅当启用增强的逐单元垂直滚动功能时生效。用于调整垂直滚动增强的限制值。当相邻单元格之间的vscroll差值超过此限制时，增强功能将自动禁用。

English: Overclock the emulated CPU. Can reduce slowdown, but may cause glitches.
Chinese: 对模拟的CPU进行超频，可减轻卡顿现象，但可能会导致一些故障。

English: Emulate system lock-ups that occur on real hardware when performing illegal address access. This should only be disabled when playing certain demos and homebrew that rely on illegal behavior for correct operation.
Chinese: 模拟真实硬件在非法地址访问时发生的系统死机现象。建议仅在运行某些依赖非法操作才能正常工作的演示程序或自制软件时，才禁用此功能。

English: Set the audio preamplifier level of the emulated Mega Drive/Genesis FM sound synthesizer or Sega Mark III/Master System FM Sound Unit.
Chinese: 调整模拟的Mega Drive/Genesis FM音频合成器或Sega Mark III/Master System FM音频单元的前置放大器电平。

English: Forces Game Gear titles to run in SMS mode, with an increased resolution of 256x192. May show additional content, but typically displays a border of corrupt/unwanted image data.
Chinese: 强制Game Gear游戏以SMS模式运行，分辨率提升至256x192。可能会显示额外内容，但边框区域通常会出现损坏或多余的图像数据。

English: Display light gun crosshairs when using the MD Menacer, MD Justifiers and MS Light Phaser input device types.
Chinese: 在使用MD Menacer、MD Justifiers或MS Light Phaser输入设备时，显示光枪准星。

English: Use a mouse-controlled 'Light Gun' or 'Touchscreen' input.
Chinese: 使用鼠标或触摸屏控制光枪。

English: Inverts the Y-axis of the MD Mouse input device type.
Chinese: 反转MD鼠标输入设备的Y轴。

English: Apply an image 'ghosting' filter to mimic the display characteristics of the Game Gear and Genesis Nomad LCD panels.
Chinese: 应用“残影”滤镜，模拟Game Gear和Genesis Nomad LCD屏幕的显示效果。

English: Cuts off 8 pixels from either the left side of the screen, or both left and right sides when running Master System games.
Chinese: 运行Master System游戏时，可裁剪屏幕左侧或左右两侧各8个像素。

English: Lock-On Technology is a Mega Drive/Genesis feature that allowed an older game to connect to the pass-through port of a special cartridge for extended or altered gameplay. This option specifies which type of special 'lock-on' cartridge to emulate. A corresponding bios file must be present in RetroArch's system directory.
Chinese: Lock-On Technology is a Mega Drive/Genesis feature that allowed an older game to connect to the pass-through port of a special cartridge for extended or altered gameplay. This option specifies which type of special 'lock-on' cartridge to emulate. A corresponding bios file must be present in RetroArch's system directory.

English: Specify the cut-off frequency of the audio low pass filter. A higher value increases the perceived 'strength' of the filter, since a wider range of the high frequency spectrum is attenuated.
Chinese: Specify the cut-off frequency of the audio low pass filter. A higher value increases the perceived 'strength' of the filter, since a wider range of the high frequency spectrum is attenuated.

English: Removes the original sprite-per-scanline hardware limit. This reduces flickering but can cause visual glitches, as some games exploit the hardware limit to generate special effects.
Chinese: Removes the original sprite-per-scanline hardware limit. This reduces flickering but can cause visual glitches, as some games exploit the hardware limit to generate special effects.

English: Enable this to display the overscan regions at the top/bottom and/or left/right of the screen. These would normally be hidden by the bezel around the edge of a standard-definition television.
Chinese: Enable this to display the overscan regions at the top/bottom and/or left/right of the screen. These would normally be hidden by the bezel around the edge of a standard-definition television.

English: Set the audio preamplifier level of the emulated SN76496 4-channel Programmable Sound Generator found in the SG-1000, Sega Mark III, Master System, Game Gear and Mega Drive/Genesis.
Chinese: Set the audio preamplifier level of the emulated SN76496 4-channel Programmable Sound Generator found in the SG-1000, Sega Mark III, Master System, Game Gear and Mega Drive/Genesis.

English: Specify which region the system is from. For consoles other than the Game Gear, 'PAL' is 50 Hz, while 'NTSC' is 60 Hz. Games may run faster or slower than normal if the incorrect region is selected.
Chinese: Specify which region the system is from. For consoles other than the Game Gear, 'PAL' is 50 Hz, while 'NTSC' is 60 Hz. Games may run faster or slower than normal if the incorrect region is selected.

English: Interlaced Mode 2 allows the Mega Drive/Genesis to output a double height (high resolution) 320x448 image by drawing alternate scan lines each frame (this is used by Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and Combat Cars multiplayer modes). 'Double Field' mimics original hardware, producing a sharp image with flickering/interlacing artifacts. 'Single Field' applies a deinterlacing filter, which stabilizes the image but causes mild blurring.
Chinese: Interlaced Mode 2 allows the Mega Drive/Genesis to output a double height (high resolution) 320x448 image by drawing alternate scan lines each frame (this is used by Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and Combat Cars multiplayer modes). 'Double Field' mimics original hardware, producing a sharp image with flickering/interlacing artifacts. 'Single Field' applies a deinterlacing filter, which stabilizes the image but causes mild blurring.

English: Select stereo or mono sound playback.
Chinese: Select stereo or mono sound playback.

English: When running Sega CD/Mega-CD content, specifies whether to share a single save file between all games from a specific region (Per-BIOS) or to create a separate save file for each game (Per-Game). Note that the Sega CD/Mega-CD has limited internal storage, sufficient only for a handful of titles. To avoid running out of space, the 'Per-Game' setting is recommended.
Chinese: When running Sega CD/Mega-CD content, specifies whether to share a single save file between all games from a specific region (Per-BIOS) or to create a separate save file for each game (Per-Game). Note that the Sega CD/Mega-CD has limited internal storage, sufficient only for a handful of titles. To avoid running out of space, the 'Per-Game' setting is recommended.

English: Runs loaded content with a specific emulated console. 'Auto' will select the most appropriate system for the current game.
Chinese: Runs loaded content with a specific emulated console. 'Auto' will select the most appropriate system for the current game.

English: Overrides the VDP mode to force it to run at either NTSC 60Hz or PAL 50Hz, regardless of system region.
Chinese: Overrides the VDP mode to force it to run at either NTSC 60Hz or PAL 50Hz, regardless of system region.

English: Enable emulation of the FM Sound Unit used by certain Sega Mark III/Master System games for enhanced audio output.
Chinese: Enable emulation of the FM Sound Unit used by certain Sega Mark III/Master System games for enhanced audio output.

English: Select method used to emulate the FM Sound Unit of the Sega Mark III/Master System. 'MAME' option is fast, and runs full speed on most systems. 'Nuked' option is cycle accurate, very high quality, and has substantial CPU requirements.
Chinese: Select method used to emulate the FM Sound Unit of the Sega Mark III/Master System. 'MAME' option is fast, and runs full speed on most systems. 'Nuked' option is cycle accurate, very high quality, and has substantial CPU requirements.

English: Select method used to emulate the FM synthesizer (main sound generator) of the Mega Drive/Genesis. 'MAME' options are fast, and run full speed on most systems. 'Nuked' options are cycle accurate, very high quality, and have substantial CPU requirements. The YM2612 chip is used by the original Model 1 Mega Drive/Genesis. The YM3438 is used in later Mega Drive/Genesis revisions.
Chinese: Select method used to emulate the FM synthesizer (main sound generator) of the Mega Drive/Genesis. 'MAME' options are fast, and run full speed on most systems. 'Nuked' options are cycle accurate, very high quality, and have substantial CPU requirements. The YM2612 chip is used by the original Model 1 Mega Drive/Genesis. The YM3438 is used in later Mega Drive/Genesis revisions.

English: Select method used to emulate the FM synthesizer (main sound generator) of the Mega Drive/Genesis. The YM2612 chip is used by the original Model 1 Mega Drive/Genesis. The YM3438 is used in later Mega Drive/Genesis revisions.
Chinese: Select method used to emulate the FM synthesizer (main sound generator) of the Mega Drive/Genesis. The YM2612 chip is used by the original Model 1 Mega Drive/Genesis. The YM3438 is used in later Mega Drive/Genesis revisions.
